SUMMARY: President Joe Biden has signed three bills to allow Arizona tribes to better access water. The action has settled longstanding water rights claims by the indigenous people.

TITLE: New Jersey beach town sues state for $21 million over dune issue
SUMMARY: The town of North Wildwood is suing the state of New Jersey for $21 million. The town is suing because the state government did not help replenish the beach after storms in the fall.

TITLE: Annual report says Maine's child welfare system needs improvements
SUMMARY: The Maine Child Welfare Services Ombudsman released a report that claims the state needs additional improvements on the child welfare system.

TITLE: 3 dead, 2 wounded in Dallas apartment complex shooting
SUMMARY: A shooting in northern Dallas early Friday morning left three people dead and two injured. An investigation is ongoing and police declined to specify if there is more than one suspect.

TITLE: MI energy company's rehabilitative program teaches inmates to climb trees, cut around power lines
SUMMARY: A Michigan energy company's planned program allows prisoners to be trained to climb trees and perform other necessary skills for post-release employment maintaining power lines.

TITLE: CO man sentenced to record 20 years for selling fentanyl that kills teen
SUMMARY: A man was sentenced for selling fentanyl-laced pills to a teen who died the next day. The man received 20 years, the longest in Colorado history for fentanyl distribution.

TITLE: Human remains found in West Virginia likely not connected to missing woman Gretchen Fleming: police
SUMMARY: The Parkersburg, West Virginia, police chief said that "there's no evidence" that human remains found about two hours away is connected to Gretchen Fleming's missing person case.

TITLE: Cleanup underway after Wisconsin dairy plant fire leaks butter into sewers
SUMMARY: The Wisconsin Department of Natural resources is cleaning up after a dairy plant fire caused large amounts of stored butter to melt, flood the building, and leak into nearby sewers.

TITLE: Most populous county in OR swears in its 1st female sheriff
SUMMARY: Oregon's Multnomah County has sworn in its first female sheriff in its 168-year history. Nicole Morrisey O’Donnell succeeds former Sheriff Mike Reese.

TITLE: Virginia police say staff member shot at elementary school
SUMMARY: Virginia police are investigating a school shooting at a local elementary school that left one adult staff member injured.

TITLE: Texas authorities arrest illegal immigrants from Costa Rica, Mexico after car chase
SUMMARY: Several illegal immigrants were arrested in Texas after a police car chase, including the driver, who was also in the country illegally.

TITLE: Missing mom Ana Walshe's former Massachusetts home burns in fire
SUMMARY: The former home of missing Massachusetts woman Ana Walshe was on fire Friday as firefighters worked to extinguish the blaze.

TITLE: Bryan Kohberger case: Why didn't Idaho roommate call 911 after encountering masked madman?
SUMMARY: A female roommate didn't call 911 after encountering Bryan Kohberger in a mask allegedly fleeing the Idaho murder scene because she likely froze from fear, experts said.

TITLE: Bryan Kohberger defense behind gag order request in Idaho murders, new batch of court docs reveal
SUMMARY: Anne Taylor, the defense attorney for Idaho stabbing suspect Bryan Kohberger, filed requests to halt the crime scene cleanup and for a gag order on the case.

TITLE: Virginia police say 6-year-old student shot teacher at Newport News elementary school
SUMMARY: Virginia police have a 6-year-old student in custody after a school shooting at a local elementary school that left one adult staff member injured.

TITLE: Chicago schools watchdog finds hundreds of employees groomed, sexually assaulted students
SUMMARY: A newly released report found that hundreds of Chicago teachers groomed and sexually assaulted students over the 2021-22 school year.

TITLE: Idaho murders: Mattress, other furniture, removed from house where four college students were killed
SUMMARY: A mattress from the Idaho crime scene where four college students were murdered was removed from the house Friday afternoon along with other furniture.

TITLE: Florida suspects 'terrorized' elderly woman with clown masks, sledgehammer: authorities
SUMMARY: Florida deputies say that four people were arrested after they allegedly terrorized a woman by wearing clown masks during a home break-in.

TITLE: Oregon education guide encourages schools to hide students' gender identity from parents
SUMMARY: Oregon education officials released a guide this week encouraging schools to affirm their students' gender identity and other measures.

TITLE: Bryan Kohberger arrest: Flight records show Pennsylvania police plane circled home for hours after capture
SUMMARY: A playback of air traffic data shows a Pennsylvania police plane circling the home of alleged killer Bryan Kohberger's parents from 4:02 a.m. to 6:22 a.m. on Dec. 30.

TITLE: Philadelphia deploying more officers to violent areas: 'We need more cops,' resident says
SUMMARY: Philadelphia will deploy more police officers in certain neighborhoods beginning Monday in an effort to curb violence crime.

TITLE: Chicago man allegedly shoots pregnant mother of own 8-year-old child, resulting in a miscarriage
SUMMARY: A Chicago man allegedly shot the pregnant mother who they share an 8-year-old daughter with, which resulted in a miscarriage, prosecutors say.

TITLE: TSA says passenger attempted to bring 'emotional support' boa constrictor snake through security
SUMMARY: The Transportation Security Administration says that someone attempted to bring a “emotional support pet” boa constrictor snake through a security checkpoint in December.

TITLE: Exclusive: CISA’s Jen Easterly wants to protect US hospitals following spate of ransomware attacks
SUMMARY: In the past three years, cyberattacks on hospitals have surged, threatening patients’ information and access to care and even resulting in some deaths.

TITLE: Georgia woman finds man fatally shot as she was walking her dog
SUMMARY: A Georgia woman was walking her dog Dekalb County when she discovered a man who had been fatally shot. Police have not yet identified the victim.

TITLE: Texas man allegedly killed his 9-year-old son: police
SUMMARY: A Texas man is facing a capital murder charge after allegedly killing his 9-year-old son, according to police. The boy was found with multiple stab wounds.

TITLE: Tennessee man accused of impersonating police officer arrested in Oklahoma
SUMMARY: A Tennessee man who was allegedly impersonating a police officer and pulling people over has been arrested in Oklahoma, according to authorities.

TITLE: Armed Florida good Samaritans detain man who allegedly assaulted, shot at 2 women
SUMMARY: A Florida man who shot at two women outside a bingo hall was detained by two concealed carry permit holders who prevented him from fleeing until police arrived.

TITLE: Hiker found dead in Texas national park after high wind warning on New Year's Eve
SUMMARY: The National Park Service said a hiker was found dead on New Year's Eve on a trail in Texas' Guadalupe Mountains National Park after a high wind warning was in effect.

TITLE: Teen pilot flying family to breakfast makes emergency landing on CA highway, grandma 'crying in the back'
SUMMARY: A California teen flying his family to breakfast made an emergency landing on a highway when his plane lost power. It landed safely with no injuries reported.

TITLE: Vegas police investigating after dog found shot multiple times and with fractured skull
SUMMARY: A dog is recovering after it was found abandoned on the side of a Las Vegas road with multiple gunshot wounds and a fractured skull.
